thread.title: Maria
thread.title_full: Home Zone Furniture reviewed by Maria

author: Maria
title: Maria
text: I was very impressed with Timothy, he help pick out furniture and made the process easy and painless, he had great customer service skills, didn't hover over me and allowed me to look but was there for any questions I had! 5+ stars for him!! Will be coming back to furnish the rest of my house
